Question: Born in Tupelo, Mississippi, this person moved to Memphis, Tennessee, with his family at the age of 13.
Hints: After his first appearance, on January 28, this person stayed in town to record at RCA's New York studio.
Parker, who intended to make this person's return the show business event of the year, oversaw a major promotional push.
B.B King recalled that he knew this person before he was popular when they both used to frequent Beale Street.
